techmeme.title: Earned Wealth, which offers wealth management services to medical professionals, raises $200M, and says it has 3,000+ clients and $2B of assets under management (Valida Pau/Bloomberg)
Apple and Google expand on their data portability initiative to allow users of Google Photos to transfer their collections directly to iCloud Photos (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
Sources: Alphabet shelves efforts to acquire HubSpot after the sides failed to reach the point of detailed discussions around due diligence; HUBS plunges 10%+ (Ryan Gould/Bloomberg)
AWS launches App Studio in public preview, which is a generative AI-powered service allowing enterprise users to create internal apps using text prompts (Shubham Sharma/VentureBeat)
OpenAI and Los Alamos National Laboratory announce a partnership to evaluate how multimodal AI models can be used safely by scientists in laboratory settings (Evan Gorelick/Bloomberg)
